data.name: Bitdisk
data.description:
BTD claims to be a distributed project supporting cloud drive application. It is claimed that with the same functions of Dropbox and Baidu Netdisk, BitDisk uses blockchain technology to make our file storage more private, more reliable and make storage more secure via remote disaster tolerant system. It is also claimed that the blockchain incentive system will also promote explosive growth of BitDisk users. 



Limited information is available for this asset.
